source:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Sigun Ul is looking for fun.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
リダ・ラーンのシグン＝ウルは、冒険者と遊びたがっているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_000<tab>Mortals in our village, how exciting! Tell me, what is your name?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_000まあ、ヒトなんて珍しい！
あなた、なんて名前なの……？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_001<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>, a lovely name. But <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> names are lovely too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_001)) (( )) 02 /var>だなんて、素敵な名前ね！
でも、私たちピクシーの名前だって、とっても素敵なのよ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_002<tab>Ah, but here's an idea! I want you to go and speak with my fellows. Ask them what their names mean. When you're done, return hither and we'll have some fun. Tee hee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_002そうだ、私の仲間のところを巡って、
「名前」と、その「由来」を聞いてきてちょうだい！
素敵な遊びを、思いついちゃったから！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_003<tab>Go around the village and ask my fellows what their names mean. When you're done, return hither and we'll have some fun!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_003私の仲間のところを巡って、
「名前」と、その「由来」を聞いてきてちょうだい！
素敵な遊びを、思いついちゃったから！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_JULFEO_000_010<tab>You wish to know the meaning of my name? Well, Jul is yew and Feo is treasure! Together it means “a treasure beneath the yew”! Beautiful, even if I do say so myself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_JULFEO_000_010名前と由来が知りたいの？
ワタシは「ユル＝フェオ」！
「イチイの木と宝物」って意味だよぉ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_JULFEO_000_011<tab>Remember, Jul is yew and Feo is treasure! Together it means “a treasure beneath the yew”! Beautiful, even if I do say so myself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_JULFEO_000_011ワタシは「ユル＝フェオ」！
「イチイの木と宝物」って意味だよぉ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_IALASUL_000_012<tab>My name is Iala Sul. Separately, the words mean the turn of the seasons and flower. Together, they make me “a flower that blooms always.” Precious, I'm sure you'll agree.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_IALASUL_000_012ぼくの名前？　「ヤラ＝スール」っていうんだ！
きみたちヒトの言葉だと、「季節の巡りと花」って意味になるよ。
ふふん、カワイイ名前でしょ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_IALASUL_000_013<tab>A flower that blooms always─that is my name in your tongue. Precious, I'm sure you'll agree.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_IALASUL_000_013ぼくの名前？　「ヤラ＝スール」っていうんだ！
きみたちヒトの言葉だと、「季節の巡りと花」って意味になるよ。
ふふん、カワイイ名前でしょ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_AENCUIN_000_014<tab>I'm Aenc Uin! Water and happiness! Happiness in the water! And I'm very happy now! Why? Because you're here! Oh, how shall we play? There are so many ways!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_AENCUIN_000_014あたしの名前は「インク＝ウィン」よ！
意味は「水と喜び」！　今のあたしも大喜び！
だってアナタがいるんだもの……どうやって遊ぼうかしら！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_AENCUIN_000_015<tab>Water and happiness! Happiness in the water! Oh, I'll think of a game for us to play soon! And then we'll have a jolly good time!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_AENCUIN_000_015あたしの名前は「インク＝ウィン」よ！
意味は「水と喜び」！　今のあたしも大喜び！
だってアナタがいるんだもの……どうやって遊ぼうかしら！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_020<tab>Welcome back! I hope you were paying attention to my fellows, because I'm going to test you on the meaning of our names!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_020おかえりなさい！　皆の名前は聞けたかしら？
ちゃんと覚えているか、試させてもらうわよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_021<tab>First question! Who is the pixie whose name means a treasure beneath the yew?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_021さあ、ひとつめの問題！
「イチイの木と宝物」の子は誰だったかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_Q1_000_000<tab>Which pixie's name means a treasure beneath the yew?
target: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_Q1_000_000<tab>「イチイの木と宝物」なピクシーは？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_022<tab>I see, I see... Right, second question. The pixie whose name means a flower that blooms always─where were they playing?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_022ふふ～ん……なるほどなるほど。
それじゃあ次の問題よ。
「季節の巡りと花」な子は、どこで遊んでいたかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_Q2_000_000<tab>Where was a flower that blooms always?
target: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_Q2_000_000<tab>「季節の巡りと花」なピクシーはどこにいた？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_023<tab>Boo, you got <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> answers wrong! But I'm a kind pixie, so I'll give you another chance. Go and speak with my fellows once more, and this time mark their words well, yes?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_023はずれ～！　もっとちゃんと覚えてほしいわ！
ほらほら、もう一度皆に聞いてらっしゃい！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_024<tab>Hmmm, one out of two isn't terrible, I suppose. All right, by way of a reward, I shall tell you more about our names!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_024うーん……1問間違ってるけど、まあいいわ！
わたしたちの名前について、もっと詳しく教えてあげる！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_025<tab>Huzzah, you got both answers correct! You were clearly paying attention, and by way of a reward, I shall tell you more about our names!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_025大正解！　嬉しいわ、ちゃんと覚えてくれたのね！
特別に、わたしたちの名前について、もっと詳しく教えてあげる！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_026<tab>You see, our names are composed of special runes of power. They are chosen to best represent our nature, and the spark of life that abides in us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_026わたしたちの名前はね、魔力が込められた、
特別な「ルーン」の組み合わせでできているの。
それぞれの命の煌めき、魔力の性質に、ぴったりな言葉を選ぶのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_027<tab>If I were to name you by our custom, it would be... Ooh, this is a tough one! Sigun Tyr, perhaps...or Ul Tyr─it really could go either way!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_027アナタの名前をつけるなら……。
そうね、「シグン＝ティル」……
いえ、もしかしたら、「ウル＝ティル」かもしれないわね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_028<tab>You wish to know the meaning, do you? Ah, but where's the fun in just telling you? You'll have to find out for yourself! Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_028ふふふ！　意味は教えてあげない！
どこかで調べてみてちょうだい！
お話してくれて、ありがと、楽しかったわ！
